excerpt: The TMC2590-EVAL allows you to explore all functions of the TMC2590-TA.The TMC2590-EVAL-KIT is a set of one MCU board Landungsbrücke, a Eselsbrücke bridge board and one TMC2590-EVAL driver board. It allows for a quick and simple start within only minutes to make your motor turning, while still providing full access to all registers and full functionality and diagnostics.For diagnosis, all signals between MCU and TMC2590 are accessible with probes on the bridge board. TMC2590-EVAL can be used with or without the Landungsbrücke MCU board. Compehensive sample code can be found in Trinamics Technology Access Package TTAP.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.
